pr_title: Only log in pubsub when it actually subscribes or unsubscribes

timeline.bodyText: why is unsub at debug while subscribe is info? I'd prefer if both were info
timeline.author: rbattle

replies.bodyText: Just left it as it was. But updated now for you.
replies.author: MikeDombo
